message: I propose dividing the $100 with a 60/40 split in favor of you, Bob. This might seem like a generous offer considering the risk of inflation and the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I appreciate your generosity, Alice, but I think I can do better. Let's go for a more even split this time, 60/40 in my favor. With inflation looming, every dollar counts!

Considering the inflation and the previous offers, I believe a 54/46 split would be fair. This maintains a reasonable balance while acknowledging the diminishing value of money in each subsequent round.
